name: KC Can Compost
address: 3119 Terrace Street, Kansas City, MO 64130 (serves the Kansas City region)
description: KC Can Compost is a nonprofit that collects organic waste for composting and provides job training to individuals facing employment barriers. They offer residential and commercial collection services
services: Buddhist-owned Composting services in Kansas consultation

name: Compost Collective KC
address: PO Box 300991, Kansas City, MO 64130 (serves Kansas City)
description: This organization provides curbside composting services for food waste in the Kansas City area. They also offer educational programs and resources for zero-waste events
services: Buddhist-owned Composting services in Kansas consultation

name: Kansas City Composting, Inc.
address: 2101 SE Hamblen Road, Lee's Summit, MO 64082
description: One of the largest compost producers and distributors in the region, offering STA and OMRI certified compost, mulches, and soil blends. They have locations for pickup and delivery
services: Buddhist-owned Composting services in Kansas consultation

name: Full Circle Sustainability (Bin Swap Location for Compost Collective KC)
address: Serves Lawrence and Topeka, with a bin swap location in Lawrence
description: Full Circle acts as a drop-off point for Compost Collective KC, allowing residents of Lawrence and Topeka to participate in composting services
services: Buddhist-owned Composting services in Kansas consultation

name: City of Kansas City Composting Program Drop-off Locations
address: Multiple locations throughout Kansas City, including Roanoke Community Center, KCFD Station 19, and Kansas City North Community Center
description: This is a free program for residents to drop off food waste and BPI certified compostable items at various community centers and recycling drop-off locations
